# Repository Description

This repository contains all of the data I need for this R module, as well as the code I have written so far.

# Repository Contents

## Data

The data folder contains data for workshops 3, 5, 6 and 8, taken from Chris Clement's GitHub. This data can also be accessed [here](https://github.com/chrit88/Bioinformatics_data).

## Code

The code file contains the analyses and simulations folders, as well as a folder containing work from the workshops so far.

## Other files:

Alongside this README file, a cheat sheet R Markdown file can be found in this repository. This contains all of the useful functions and insights I have learnt in this module so far. This can also be found [here](https://github.com/rosiecha/bioinformatics/blob/main/Cheat%20Sheet.Rmd).
